# init(mutating:)

**Initializer**

Creates a mutable typed pointer referencing the same memory as the given immutable pointer.

## Declaration

```swift
init(mutating other: UnsafePointer<Pointee>)
```

## Parameters

- **other**: The immutable pointer to convert.
title: init(mutating:)
